Tarot.name: The Fool
Tarot.description: Creates the last Tarot or Planet card used during this run The Fool excluded

Tarot.name: The Magician
Tarot.description: Enhances 2 selected cards to Lucky Cards

Tarot.name: The High Priestess
Tarot.description: Creates up to 2 random Planet cards (Must have room)

Tarot.name: The Empress
Tarot.description: Enhances 2 selected cards to Mult Cards

Tarot.name: The Emperor
Tarot.description: Creates up to 2 random Tarot cards (Must have room)

Tarot.name: The Hierophant
Tarot.description: Enhances 2 selected cards to Bonus Cards

Tarot.name: The Lovers
Tarot.description: Enhances 1 selected card into a Wild Card

Tarot.name: The Chariot
Tarot.description: Enhances 1 selected card into a Steel Card

Tarot.name: Justice
Tarot.description: Enhances 1 selected card into a Glass Card

Tarot.name: The Hermit
Tarot.description: Doubles money (Max of $20)

Tarot.name: The Wheel of Fortune
Tarot.description: 1 in 4 chance to add Foil, Holographic, or Polychrome edition to a random Joker

Tarot.name: Strength
Tarot.description: Increases rank of up to 2 selected cards by 1

Tarot.name: The Hanged Man
Tarot.description: Destroys up to 2 selected cards

Tarot.name: Death
Tarot.description: Select 2 cards, convert the left card into the right card (Drag to rearrange)

Tarot.name: Temperance
Tarot.description: Gives the total sell value of all current Jokers (Max of $50)

Tarot.name: The Devil
Tarot.description: Enhances 1 selected card into a Gold Card

Tarot.name: The Tower
Tarot.description: Enhances 1 selected card into a Stone Card

Tarot.name: The Star
Tarot.description: Converts up to 3 selected cards to  Diamonds

Tarot.name: The Moon
Tarot.description: Converts up to 3 selected cards to  Clubs

Tarot.name: The Sun
Tarot.description: Converts up to 3 selected cards to  Hearts

Tarot.name: Judgement
Tarot.description: Creates a random Joker card (Must have room)

Tarot.name: The World
Tarot.description: Converts up to 3 selected cards to Spades

Planet.name: Mercury
Planet.description: Increases Pair hand value by +1 Mult and +15 Chips

Planet.name: Venus
Planet.description: Increases Three of a Kind hand value by +2 Mult and +20 Chips

Planet.name: Earth
Planet.description: Increases Full House hand value by +2 Mult and +25 Chips

Planet.name: Mars
Planet.description: Increases Four of a Kind hand value by +3 Mult and +30 Chips

Planet.name: Jupiter
Planet.description: Increases Flush hand value by +2 Mult and +15 Chips

Planet.name: Saturn
Planet.description: Increases Straight hand value by +3 Mult and +30 Chips

Planet.name: Uranus
Planet.description: Increases Two Pair hand value by +1 Mult and +20 Chips

Planet.name: Neptune
Planet.description: Increases Straight Flush hand value by +4 Mult and +40 Chips

Planet.name: Pluto
Planet.description: Increases High Card hand value by +1 Mult and +10 Chips

Planet.name: Planet X
Planet.description: Increases Five of a Kind hand value by +3 Mult and +35 Chips

Planet.name: Ceres
Planet.description: Increases Flush House hand value by +4 Mult and +40 Chips

Planet.name: Eris
Planet.description: Increases Flush Five hand value by +3 Mult and +50 Chips

Spectral.name: Familiar
Spectral.description: Destroy 1 random card in your hand, add 3 random Enhanced face cards to your hand

Spectral.name: Grim
Spectral.description: Destroy 1 random card in your hand, add 2 random Enhanced Joker Aces to your hand

Spectral.name: Incantation
Spectral.description: Destroy 1 random card in your hand, add 4 random Enhanced numbered cards to your hand

Spectral.name: Talisman
Spectral.description: Add a Gold Seal to 1 selected card in your hand

Spectral.name: Aura
Spectral.description: Add Foil, Holographic, or Polychrome effect to 1 selected card in hand

Spectral.name: Wraith
Spectral.description: Creates a random Rare Joker, sets money to $0

Spectral.name: Sigil
Spectral.description: Converts all cards in hand to a single random suit

Spectral.name: Ouija
Spectral.description: Converts all cards in hand to a single random rank -1 hand size

Spectral.name: Ectoplasm
Spectral.description: Add Negative to a random Joker, -1 hand size

Spectral.name: Immolate
Spectral.description: Destroys 5 random cards in hand, gain $20

Spectral.name: Ankh
Spectral.description: Create a copy of a random Joker, destroy all other Jokers (Removes Negative from copy)

Spectral.name: Deja Vu
Spectral.description: Add a Red Seal to 1 selected card in your hand

Spectral.name: Hex
Spectral.description: Add Polychrome to a random Joker, destroy all other Jokers

Spectral.name: Trance
Spectral.description: Add a Blue Seal to 1 selected card in your hand

Spectral.name: Medium
Spectral.description: Add a Purple Seal to 1 selected card in your hand

Spectral.name: Cryptid
Spectral.description: Create 2 copies of 1 selected card in your hand

Spectral.name: The Soul
Spectral.description: Creates a Legendary Joker (Must have room)

Spectral.name: Black Hole
Spectral.description: Upgrade every poker hand by 1 level
